---
output:
  html_document:
    keep_md: yes
    mathjax: null
    md_extensions: +tex_math_double_backslash
    pandoc_args: [
      "--webtex=https://chart.googleapis.com/chart?cht=tx&chl=", ""
    ]
  pdf_document:
    md_extensions: +tex_math_double_backslash
  word_document:
    md_extensions: +tex_math_double_backslash
params:
  a:
    input: slider
    label: This is a
    max: 50
    min: 1
    step: 3
    value: 40
  b:
    input: slider
    label: This is b
    max: 80
    min: 50
    step: 1
    value: 60
  c:
    input: numeric
    label: This is c
    max: 80
    min: 50
    step: 5
    value: 75
  gender:
    choices:
    - male
    - female
    inline: yes
    input: radio
    label: 'Gender:'
    value: male
  region:
    choices:
    - east
    - west
    - north
    - south
    input: select
    label: 'Region:'
    value: north
  word:
    input: text
    label: 'Word of the day:'
    placeholder: Type the word of the day
    value: 'nothing'
---

adfadsf
 Inline style double backslash paren style \\(\frac{3}{4}\\) blah

   Inline code style  backslash paren style \\(\frac{`r params$a`}{4}\\)

$$
`r {
    x<-params$a; 
    mu<-params$b; 
    numer<-(x-mu); 
    sigma<-1.2; 
    z<-(x-mu)/sigma
    sprintf("z=\\frac{x-\\mu}{\\sigma}=\\frac{%s-%s}{%s}=\\frac{%s}{%s}=%s",
                                                x,mu,sigma,numer,sigma,z)
   }`
$$
